text: last post of tonight umm this is me now moth ! 500 like and ill make a polished full reference sheet ok?ok.
forsaken a game i did contribute to... being the one who made the lobby...  (90% of it, someone finished the big spawn cabin for me cus i lost motivation) little story too why i left and stuff
SONIC.EXE.... (model+render by me)
GUEST 666... (model+render by me)
I didn't pull my work because I was paid but again I never really cared about the pay, I just wanted to be part of a passion project

I have no hate or anything to the game besides justI was able to play my beautiful sonic.exe model in the game until one day high role devs all decided to just
not let contributors play special/dev characters due to..

guessing someone somehow got access to guest 666 and used him in a public lobby that was recorded for what i got told at least which I don't get because 1. why would you give someone access and not me..üòø 2, Why do I have to be shot when all I had was sonic.exe and nothing else

I've been part of this project since the start when all because a friend asked if I wanted to join the team explained how they wanted the game for it to be slightly different but overall the game isn't too bad it still stayed with the whole roblox horror dbd type game

it saddened me more after when I left testers and moderators were able to start using special/dev characters again
the team became so packed too I knew I wouldn't really have anything else to do for the team so I knew leaving was my only option left

I wouldn't have pulled my work anyways if I "wasn't" paid because I'm not that greedy I still support the game I just wanted to get this off my chest still a great game for roblox since I still enjoy the game regardless I just hate that my own son had to be taken from me
I'll always remember the once called damnation...
also the lighting where i made the lobby is a lot different than the in-game version for some reason lol it was pretty much a redo of someone's very old little map that they wanted as a lobby

for the most part I wanted to focus on my own game too i was never fired by anyone on the team i really just didnt think i was fit to be part of the team anymore im happy i was able to contribute with what I was able to do!
"By your side.."
please vouch for this man

it sucks to see work of mine such as maps being copied for their own game
its cool for it to be practice n all but when its being used for another game it really disappoints me
it shouldn't be that difficult either to be original with green hills or you can't run as maps i would show what im talking about but i dont want to attack the one whos been doing this

small rant but  i really dislike when people make stuff that looks exactly like outcome memories then proceed to criticize our game for no reason like i dont really want to see the newest sneak peek map immediately get remade and get put in a new tiktok sonic.exe game
i dont usually share my work outside of om as much anymore but this was a john doe take i made in blender its not being used for anything though so #ROBLOX #JohnDoe
